sentences.en: A mosquito - netting completely surrounds our bed.
sentences.cn: 一顶蚊帐把我们的床完全围住了.

sentences.en: A mosquito had bitten her and her arm had swollen up.
sentences.cn: 蚊子叮了她,她的手臂肿起来了.

sentences.en: A single mosquito can infect a large number of people.
sentences.cn: 一只蚊子就可以感染很多人。

sentences.en: All door and window is sealed for the extermination of mosquito.
sentences.cn: 为了消灭蚊子，所有的门窗都被封闭起来了。

sentences.en: Are your mosquito bites still itching?
sentences.cn: 你被蚊子咬的地方还痒 吗 ?

sentences.en: Avoiding mosquito bites is easier said than done.
sentences.cn: 防蚊叮咬好说难做。

sentences.en: Can I go to the theatre?"asked a mosquito to her mother. "Yes, but.
sentences.cn: “我可以去电影院吗？”一只蚊子问妈妈。“可以，但是要小心。

sentences.en: He crushes it, with one hydraulic hand, almost unconsciously, like someone swatting a mosquito.
sentences.cn: 他下意识地地用液压手将它拍个稀烂，就像拍死一只蚊子。

sentences.en: He started reading when he was knee - high to a mosquito.
sentences.cn: 他很小的时候就开始读书.

sentences.en: He swatted the mosquito with a newspaper.
sentences.cn: 他用报纸打蚊子.

sentences.en: I slapped at the mosquito but missed.
sentences.cn: 我打蚊子,但没打中.

sentences.en: I threw aside my mosquito net and jumped out of bed.
sentences.cn: 我把蚊帐甩到一边，跳下床来。

sentences.en: In the mosquito net there are four mosquitoes to fly.
sentences.cn: 蚊帐中有四只蚊子在飞.

sentences.en: She made a swipe at the mosquito.
sentences.cn: 她挥臂打蚊子.

sentences.en: The frog darted out its tongue to catch a mosquito.
sentences.cn: 这只青蛙突然伸出舌头捕捉蚊子。

sentences.en: The male mosquito never stings.
sentences.cn: 雄蚊不叮。

sentences.en: The use of mosquito lure female mosquitoes.
sentences.cn: 运用蚊子的趋光性引诱雌蚊。

sentences.en: There're mosquito repellents available in the shops.
sentences.cn: 在商店可以买到驱蚊剂.

sentences.en: They hope this will help in developing better mosquito attractants that will divert them away from humans and reduce the threat of malaria infection.
sentences.cn: 他们希望这项研究将有助于开发更好的蚊子引诱剂，把它们从人类身边引开，并减少疟疾感染的威胁。

sentences.en: We were plagued by the ubiquitous mosquito.
sentences.cn: 我们被无处不在的蚊子所困扰.

sentences.en: When an infected mosquito bites a human, spores are injected into the blood.
sentences.cn: 感染病毒的蚊子叮咬人之后，孢子便被注入血液中。

trans.tran_en: a small flying insect that sucks the blood of people and animals, sometimes spreading the disease  malaria
